venue.name: Whole Food's on Prospect Street - For Boarding at Gunstock Mountain

item.description:
Meet at the Whole Foods in Central Square on Prospect Street - 115 Prospect Street
Cambridge, MA 02139 at 7:30 am sharp. We'll drive up together for a day of fun boarding (we're open to skiers too!).

We'll have a Zip Car rented that we can split (if you own a car and would like to use that instead let us know and we'll split the cost that way).

Expected time of return: When all the gnar has been shredded.
item.why:
Gunstock is close mountain great for all levels of boarders and we want to meet new boarders in the area to go with us.
Gunstock Mountain http://www.gunstock.com/ - 719 Cherry Valley Road Gilford, New Hampshire
item.name: Snowboarding at Gunstock Mountain (New Hampshire) 3/5/11
